subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Martellus Bennett, who joined the Giants in the off-season, is a skilled tight end whose talents off the field make him one of the most intriguing players in the N.F.L.
snippet: Martellus Bennett, who joined the Giants in the off-season, is a skilled tight end whose talents off the field make him one of the most intriguing players in the N.F.L.
